ai-patthana16.15:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.15:0.3_0: Talking on the outcomes of sense desires,
ai-patthana16.15:1.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to a foundation for support. Unskillful conditions, there is no cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana16.15:1.1_1: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to a foundation for support. Unware, there is no cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana16.15:1.1_2: A skillful person doesn’t give rise to a basis, nor skilled in objects to a basis, or skilled in objects of the senses. Their cause and reasons don’t arise because of these three things.
ai-patthana16.15:2.1_0: For one who has an unwholesome thought, the teaching doesn’t give rise to the support. Consciousness is a condition for the sake of unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana16.15:2.1_1: Unskillfulness arises in thought, the teaching doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana16.15:2.1_2: Unskillfulness arises in thought, and skilled in the objects, and doesn’t arise because of its object.
ai-patthana16.15:3.1_0: Not unprofitable teaching, no cause or condition. The reason isn’t give rise to the three.
ai-patthana16.15:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.15:5.1_0: Not unprofitable teaching, not unskillful. Consciousness doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.15:5.1_1: Not unprofitable teaching, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.15:5.1_2: Not unprofitable thought, skilled in loss, and skilled in means. By means of the supports there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.15:5.1_3: This is the section in brief.
